title: Luke 20: They Sought to Destroy Him
short_title: Luke 20: They Sought to Destroy Him
content: took place during the last week of the Savior’s mortal life. As you read it, consider the following questions: Why did the Jewish leaders want to destroy Jesus? What claims did Jesus make that angered them? Why might those people have felt that way, especially considering the love, compassion, and joy Jesus offered during His ministry? What can I learn from the Savior’s example about how to handle those who oppose the kingdom of God?
